nearest_city_distance.main package¶

Submodules¶

nearest_city_distance.main.get_country module¶

Created on Aug 16, 2021

@author: wacero

nearest_city_distance.main.get_country.get_country(location)¶

This function returns the name of the country to an event if it has the exact location, otherwise it returns the nearest country.

Country name is given in ascii.

Parameters:

location (tupla) – event_location(latitude,longitude)

Returns:

country_name

Return type:

String

nearest_city_distance.main.get_country.get_nearest_country(location)¶

This function return the name of country to an event. Country name is given in ascii.

Parameters:

location (tupla) – event_location(latitude,longitude)

Returns:

country_name

Return type:

String

nearest_city_distance.main.get_country.point_in_polygon(location, polygon)¶

This function return the name of country to an event. Country name is given in ascii.

Parameters:

  • location (tupla) – event_location(latitude,longitude)

  • polygon (shapefile) – Store geometric location and attribute information

Returns:

inside

Return type:

Boolean

nearest_city_distance.main.get_distance module¶

Created on Aug 5, 2021

@author: wacero

nearest_city_distance.main.get_distance.get_nearest_city(event_location)¶

This function return the nearest city and distance to an event. Distance is given in kilometers and city name in ascii.

Parameters:

event_location (tupla) – (latitude,longitude)

Returns:

round(distance, 2)

Returns:

city

Returns:

province

nearest_city_distance.main.views module¶

Created on Aug 6, 2021

@author: wacero

nearest_city_distance.main.views.call_get_country()¶

Allows to call get_country function once access token was verified, and then gets the country based on given coordinates.

Returns:

str(get_country.get_country(event_location))

Return type:

String

nearest_city_distance.main.views.call_get_nearest_city()¶

Allows to call get_nearest_city function once access token was verified, and then gets the location of nearest city based on given coordinates.

Returns:

str(get_distance.get_nearest_city(event_location))

Return type:

String
